headline: White Hat (an EPAM company) Wins Global Recognition as Outstanding Cybersecurity Consultant
summary: White Hat (an EPAM company), a premier cybersecurity company acquired in 2021 by the US digital transformation leader EPAM (NYSE: EPAM), won the 2025 Outstanding Security Performance Award (OSPA) in the category of Outstanding Cybersecurity Consultant.

headline: Globant: Thoroughly Discounted For A 2026 Rebound
summary: Globant faces near-zero growth in 2025 due to macro headwinds and delayed IT spending, but this slowdown is sector-wide. Read my analysis.
